Flow.description: Sub flow to pre-fill checklist values from across the household

formulas.name: employmentText
formulas.expression: {!Employment.Person_Account__r.AddressedName__pc} + " (" + {!Employment.Name} + ")" + {!br} + "Gross salary: £" + TEXT({!Employment.Salary__c}) + " py" + {!br} + "Net salary: INSERT" + {!br} + "Average gross bonus: £" + TEXT({!Employment.Average_bonus__c}) + " / Average net bonus: INSERT" + {!br} + "Salary sacrifice/workplace pension contributions: INSERT" + {!br} + "Business dividends: £" + TEXT({!Employment.Business_Dividends__c}) + {!br} + "Employment status: " + TEXT({!Employment.FinServ__EmploymentStatus__c}) + {!br} + {!br}

formulas.name: householdSavingText
formulas.expression: "Cash: £" + TEXT({!Advice.Advice_Household__r.CashSavingsMonthly__c}) + " pm / £" + TEXT(12*{!Advice.Advice_Household__r.CashSavingsMonthly__c}) + " py" + {!br} + "ISAs: £" + TEXT({!Advice.Advice_Household__r.IsaSavingMonthly__c}) + " pm / £" + TEXT(12*{!Advice.Advice_Household__r.IsaSavingMonthly__c}) + " py" + {!br} + "Pensions: £" + TEXT({!Advice.Advice_Household__r.PensionsSavingsMonthly__c}) + " pm / £" + TEXT(12*{!Advice.Advice_Household__r.PensionsSavingsMonthly__c}) + " py" + {!br} + "Others: £" + TEXT({!Advice.Advice_Household__r.OthersSavingMonthly__c}) + " pm / £" + TEXT(12*{!Advice.Advice_Household__r.OthersSavingMonthly__c}) + " py" + {!br}

formulas.name: householdSpendingText
formulas.expression: "Essential: £" + TEXT(ROUND({!Advice.Advice_Household__r.EssentialSpendingMonthly__c},2)) + " pm / £" + TEXT(ROUND(12*{!Advice.Advice_Household__r.EssentialSpendingMonthly__c},2)) + " py" + {!br} + "Non-essential: £" + TEXT(ROUND({!Advice.Advice_Household__r.NonEssentialSpendingMonthly__c},2)) + " pm / £" + TEXT(ROUND(12*{!Advice.Advice_Household__r.NonEssentialSpendingMonthly__c},2)) + " py" + {!br} + "Rent: £" + TEXT(ROUND({!Advice.Advice_Household__r.RentMonthly__c},2)) + " pm / £" + TEXT(ROUND(12*{!Advice.Advice_Household__r.RentMonthly__c},2)) + " py" + {!br} + "Charitable giving: " + {!Advice.Advice_Household__r.Giving__c}

formulas.name: incomeAssetText
formulas.expression: {!Get_income_from_asset.Asset__r.Name} + " (" + {!Get_income_from_asset.Asset__r.AssetType__r.Name} + ") Gross rental income: £" + TEXT(IF(ISPICKVAL({!Get_income_from_asset.AmountFrequency__c}, 'Monthly'),{!Get_income_from_asset.Amount__c}, IF(ISPICKVAL({!Get_income_from_asset.AmountFrequency__c},'Weekly'),ROUND({!Get_income_from_asset.Amount__c}*52/12,0), ROUND({!Get_income_from_asset.Amount__c}/12,0)))) + " pm / £" + TEXT(IF(ISPICKVAL({!Get_income_from_asset.AmountFrequency__c}, 'Monthly'),{!Get_income_from_asset.Amount__c}*12, IF(ISPICKVAL({!Get_income_from_asset.AmountFrequency__c},'Weekly'),{!Get_income_from_asset.Amount__c}*52, {!Get_income_from_asset.Amount__c}))) + " py" + {!br} + "Net rental income: pm / py" + {!br}

formulas.name: liabilityDetailsPart2
formulas.expression: "Balance: £" + TEXT({!Liabilities.Balance__c}) + {!br} + "Rate type: " + TEXT({!Liabilities.RateType__c}) + {!br} + "Interest rate: " + TEXT(100*{!Liabilities.InterestRate__c}) + "%" + {!br} + "Fixed rate expiry: " + TEXT({!Liabilities.FixedRateExpiry__c}) + {!br} + "End date: " + TEXT({!Liabilities.EndDate__c}) + {!br} + "Repayment amount: £" + TEXT({!Liabilities.RepaymentAmount__c}) + " " + TEXT({!Liabilities.RepaymentFrequency__c}) + {!br} + "Internal notes: " + {!Liabilities.NotesInternal__c} + {!br} + "Customer notes: " + {!Liabilities.NotesCustomer__c} + {!br} + {!br}

formulas.name: mpaaText
formulas.expression: IF( ISPICKVAL({!Loop_throughClients.MoneyPurchaseAnnualAllowanceStatus__pc},"TRIGGERED"), TEXT({!Loop_throughClients.MoneyPurchaseAnnualAllowanceStatus__pc}) + ": " + {!Loop_throughClients.MoneyPurchaseAnnualAllowanceTriggerNotes__pc}, IF( ISPICKVAL({!Loop_throughClients.MoneyPurchaseAnnualAllowanceStatus__pc},""), "MPAA status unknown. Please review and update both here and on the person account.", "Not triggered"))

formulas.name: recommendedReserveText
formulas.expression: "3/9/12/24 months expenditure = £" + TEXT(3*{!totalExpenditure}) + " / £" + TEXT(9*{!totalExpenditure}) + " / £" + TEXT(12*{!totalExpenditure}) + " / £" + TEXT(24*{!totalExpenditure}) + "." + {!br}

formulas.name: retirementText
formulas.expression: {!Loop_throughClients.AddressedName__pc} + ": Retirement target: " + TEXT({!Loop_throughClients.Retirement_Target__c}) + ". Current age: " + TEXT({!Loop_throughClients.FinServ__Age__pc}) + ". Time to retirement: " + TEXT({!Loop_throughClients.Retirement_Target__c} - {!Loop_throughClients.FinServ__Age__pc})

formulas.name: RiskCallNotesFormula
formulas.expression: {!UnderstandingVar} & BR() & {!FocusOnReturnVar} & BR() & {!FocusOnRiskVar} & BR() & {!VolatilityVar} & BR() & {!ExperienceVar} & BR() & {!KnowledgeVar} & BR() & {!ExperiencedInvestorCommentsVar} & BR() & {!SplittingOfAdviceVar} & BR() & {!RiskDiscussionNotesVar}

formulas.name: stateParagraph
formulas.expression: {!client1Name} + ": x full years, x years to retirement / In payment = £ py" + {!br} + IF(NOT(ISBLANK({!client2Name})), {!client2Name} + ": x full years, x years to retirement / In payment = £ py", "")

Flow.label: Advice Checklist | Pre-fill values

recordLookups.name: Get_cash_account_financial_product_type
recordLookups.label: Get cash account financial product type

textTemplates.name: annualReviewOngoingSuitability
textTemplates.text:
Annual review FF questions

Anything else we should know?: {!Advice.OW_review__r.OW_anything_else_to_know__c}

Expected changes (long term): {!Advice.OW_review__r.OW_expected_changes_long_term__c}

Expected changes (short term): {!Advice.OW_review__r.OW_expected_changes_short_term__c}


Catch up call notes

[copy relevant notes from outstanding info section]


Changes to circumstances


Regulars & affordability

Check if there are regulars in place, if so, are they still affordable/ 

If not - No regulars in place, no affordability assessment. 


Wrappers and ownership


Fees

Are they being taken from most tax efficient source? I.e. ISAs from GIA
